name: National Safety Hotline
description: Free 24/7 confidential support, safety planning, and local resource connections
fullDescription: The National Safety Hotline provides free, confidential support 24/7 for individuals and families experiencing unsafe situations at home. Trained advocates offer crisis intervention, safety planning, and connections to local resources.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 phone support (1-800-799-7233)
- Text support (text START to 88788)
- Online chat available
- Safety planning assistance
- Local resource referrals
- Support in 200+ languages
- TTY line for deaf/hard of hearing
howToGetIt:
1. Call 1-800-799-7233 anytime
2. Or text START to 88788
3. Or chat online at thehotline.org
4. Trained advocates available 24/7
5. Completely confidential
6. No judgment, just support
